          <title>
            <string language="hu">Dionüszosz-jelenetek</string>
            <string language="en">Dionysiac scenes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dionysiac Szenen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Scènes de Dionysiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cenas de Dionysiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scene di Dionysiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκηνές Dionysiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escenas de Dionysiac</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Dionüszosz-jelenetek egy vörösalakos kratér-váza rajza után</string>
            <string language="en">Dionysiac scenes were made after the drawing of a red-figure krater vase</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Dionüszosz kratér váza ,  </string>
            <string language="en">Dionysos, krater, vase</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dionysiac Szenen wurden nach der Zeichnung einer 
Rotabbildung krater Vase gebildet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des scènes de Dionysiac ont été faites après 
le schéma d'une rouge-figure vase à krater</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As cenas de Dionysiac foram feitas após o 
desenho de uma vermelho-figura vaso do krater</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le scene di Dionysiac sono state fatte dopo 
l'illustrazione di una rosso-figura vase del krater</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σκηνές Dionysiac έγιναν μετά από το σχέδιο 
vase κόκκινος-αριθμού krater</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las escenas de Dionysiac fueron hechas después 
del gráfico de una rojo-figura florero del krater</string>
